FuncDef: To enable or disable automatic polling in the name server database, use the fcns no-auto-poll command.

ParaDef.Info: (Optional) Specifies a Virtual SAN (VSAN) ID. The range is from 1 to 4093.
(Optional) Specifies the port WWN, with the format hh : hh : hh : hh : hh : hh : hh : hh.

ExtraInfo:
One name server can be configured to proxy another name server, and the name server information can be displayed using the CLI. The name server can be viewed using the CLI or the Cisco Fabric Manager.All name server registration requests come from the same port whose parameter is registered or changed. If it does not, then the request is rejected.
Command Default:None
msg: Error CLI:no fcns no-auto-poll [ vsan <vsan-id> ] | [ wwn <wwn-id> ]
